data.title: Terry Moore - Director Of Communications at OC Fair & Event Center
data.meta_description: Terry Moore has a diverse work experience spanning various roles and companies.
data.text:
Terry Moore has a diverse work experience spanning various roles and companies. Terry started their career in 1989 as a Features Editor at Daily Breeze and then held positions as a Managing Editor at IdeaForest.com/Joann.com and ModeStyle.com, both divisions of Freedom Communications. In 2001, they became the Vice President of Interactive Content at myoc.com, also a division of Freedom Communications. From 2006 to 2008, they served as the Vice President of Online Content at Freedom Interactive, where they were responsible for developing and implementing digital growth strategies and leading interactive content efforts for Freedom's nationwide newspaper and broadcast divisions. Following this role, Terry worked as the Deputy Editor at The Orange County Register from 2002 to 2014. In 2014, they became the Director of Marketing at South County Outreach. Currently, they hold the position of Director of Communications at OC Fair & Event Center, where they have been working since 2017. In addition to their work experience, Terry is also a voice-over artist specializing in commercial, narration, and promotional projects.

Terry Moore earned a BA degree in Journalism from California State University, Fresno. Other details about the start year, end year, and any additional education are not provided.
